price: ដូចេ្នះ នៅថ្ងៃនេះ(ថ្ងៃបរលោក) បណ្ដាអ្នកដែលមាន ជំនឿសើចចំអកចំពោះពួកដែលគ្មានជំនឿវិញ។
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
